message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CL. 

The paper deals with the problem of projecting 3D point clouds into a 2D image space for segmentation using traditional 2D convolutional neural networks. This involves techniques from computer vision (cs.CV), graph drawing (cs.GR), machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI), and natural language processing (cs.CL) for the formulation of the problem as an integer programming problem.
